entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:21 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -28.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -28.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -33.8°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
